nodes.text: Dark Hands is a short story by August and Cynthia Hahn, released on August 18, 2005, and set within the Living Force setting from Wizards of the Coast. Following the story arc of Jedi Master Darrus Jeht, it describes his sabotage of a Separatist factory building DSD1 dwarf spider droids from the perspective of a fallen Jedi that Jeht was sent to kill.
